tr.description:
Imagine a magical factory, appearing right in your living room. A carefully planned masterpiece, where diligent workers throw together anything customers want. Rubber ducks and dressers, drones and electric guitars, scooters and other wonderful goods can be created from many different materials and sold for hard cash – cash you invest right back into your factory to get more machines, more workers and grow your business. In Little Big Workshop you become a factory tycoon!

Real factories - made FUN
You are the Big Boss and it’s time to take charge of your very own tabletop factory. Organize the factory floor, manage your workers, purchase machinery, and design efficient production lines - all within the time-limit and to your client's satisfaction! 

An open-ended sandbox-experience
Take it easy, it’s a sandbox-experience where you think, ponder and poke at things until you get it to work the way you’d like. Supply products to clients and an ever-changing market, as you produce over 50 unique product types, built from multiple parts and pieces - all of which can be created with different materials and production methods. No two factories should ever look the same.

Tiny hands, big dreams
Start out with just a small workshop and expand to a desk-filling factory. Unlock ever fancier machines, add even more production methods, and most of all, more room. Soon enough you’ll be running multiple production lines, producing hundreds of advanced products each day, and watching with joy as your cute workers do the actual work.

Features:
- Varying industries and a wide range of products
- Focus on practical problems, not on values, economics, or logistics
- Organize all steps of the production on a blueprint
- Factories grow as you unlock more desk space
- Fully simulated Day/Night-cycle
- Take care of your workers! Work them too hard and they drop like flies
- Cute model-town art-style

You will be able to explore your eating habits visually and improve your eating habits. No calories and no numbers are shown in the app! 

Features:
+ Beautifully minimalist food diary app
+ In-App Camera And Filter
+ No calories No Pressure
+ Visualizes all your diets and shows your diet balance clearly!
+ Crazy and Interactive Foody Face
+ Learn how to eat mindfully and correctly right now!

Don’t make Foody Face angry! Tap download right now!

----------

The inspiration behind FoodyLife is that nowadays people pay little attention to what they eat and often eat unhealthy food. Although there are many similar apps on the market (e.g. Fitness App, Calorie counter...), most of them focus mainly on “numbers”, such as how many calories the user has eaten and how long the user should exercise to get rid of those calories, or sending the user notifications when they should get up to exercise or if they have eaten too much.

FoodyLife’ is an app that helps users track their daily diet by allowing them to keep their own food diary. The app shows neither calories nor numbers; instead, users have only to take a picture, enter their diet information, then they are able their overall diet balance. It is very simple and highly effective. Users can explore their eating habits visually, improving self-consciousness about eating habits.

tr.description:
An open world adventure game filled with silly characters and terrible secrets.

Afterplace is an adventurous indie game for mobile devices. It's a huge open world, full of hidden secrets, treasures, and creatures. You'll run around the woods, fight monsters, and talk to ostensibly shady characters! All from your pocket! Be warned though - you never know what the forest might be hiding, and not all trails are paved. Labyrinths and dungeons are tucked away in the most concealed nooks. There are no waypoints in Afterplace. You'll have to forge your own path.

Afterplace has been designed from the ground up to be a fast, fluid, beautiful experience for mobile. There are no virtual buttons. You can move and attack by touching anywhere. You can tap objects directly to interact or attack, use two thumbs like a traditional controller, or control the game with a physical gamepad. The game will adapt dynamically to your play style. Pick up and set down the game at your own pace, it will always save your progress. Afterplace is made to feel like a full-fledged indie adventure game that fits in your pocket.


About the Author:
Afterplace is made by one person, Evan Kice. A former software engineer from Austin TX, Evan quit his job (to the dismay of his friends and family) and has been working full time on Afterplace since early 2019. The initial game released in December of 2022, but Evan plans on continuing to support and polish the game when he can!

tr.releaseNotes:
The shadows over Hue County grow darker in the wake of a shocking murder.

Step into the elegant Noir Mansion and interrogate six suspects too sharp for their own good. They'll point fingers in every direction and offer up promises of honesty. 

But you know better. Trust nothing but your clue sheet...

Could it have been Crime Reporter Scarlett with the Mini Revolver? Maybe Private Detective Mustard used the "Civil War" Musket with Bayonet? Did Risk Analyst Plum turn himself into a liability with the Billiard Stick, or perhaps Lawyer Peacock cracked with the Meat Tenderiser. Did Signature Forger White sign off Boddy's death with the Silver Candelabra? Or maybe Con Artist Green phoned in a deadly performance with the Rotary Phone... 

With the Noir Mansion crime scene, you can toggle the special Noir filter at any time during your game! See the mansion in its full-colour glory, or drench it in deep, cinematic shadows. 

You'll also unlock Noir-themed cosmetics to dress up in true vintage style!

INCLUDES:
- A BRAND-NEW CRIME SCENE – The highly requested film-noir theme arrives in Clue/Cluedo!
- THEMED COSMETICS – This crime scene includes a new player avatar, a different card back, a themed clue sheet, a sleek dice set and 12 new tokens.
- MORE STORY TO EXPLORE – Delve into the murky backstories of each suspect and uncover their motives.
tr.description:
Join fellow detectives all over the world in the official digital board game version of Clue/Cluedo! Gather crucial evidence, interrogate suspects and solve the original murder mystery.

Follow Miss Scarlett, Colonel Mustard, Professor Plum, Chef White, Solicitor Peacock and Mayor Green through the iconic Tudor Mansion, unlocking their motives and alibis as you go. 

Enjoy Clue/Cluedo the way you remember it in Classic Mode, or jump in for a quick game with Clue Cards mode. Alternatively, if you want to really test your sleuthing skills, try a new investigation format available exclusively to Clue/Cluedo – Ultimate Detective.

In Ultimate Detective Mode, everyone answers suggestions at the same time…but secretly! 

Face your suspects in a direct interrogation as you rely on your skills of deduction to get to the truth. Experience the mystery, solve the murder and become a top-tier detective!

HOW TO PLAY CLUE/CLUEDO: 

1. Three cards are dealt face-down and set aside – this is the solution to the crime!
2. Everyone is dealt three Clue Cards. These are automatically crossed off your clue sheet, as they can’t be part of the solution. 
3. Roll the dice and move around the board. 
4. When you enter a room, you can make a suggestion – select who you think the murderer is, what weapon they used and where the crime happened. 
5. Other players will then aim to disprove your suggestion; if one of your suggestions matches a card in their hand, they show you that card to disprove it. 
6. Use your clue sheet to keep track of which characters, weapons and rooms have been disproven. 
7. Think you’ve figured it out? It’s time to make an accusation! Be careful though – if you’re right, you win, but if you are wrong, you’re out! 

FEATURES

- THE CLASSIC TUDOR MANSION – Play the beloved original board game, now rendered in stunning 3D animation and entirely ad-free! 
- A BRAND-NEW GAME MODE – Exclusive to the digital version of Clue/Cluedo, Ultimate Detective Mode lets you interrogate multiple characters at once.
- MULTIPLE MODES – Compete against cutting-edge AI opponents that adapt to your skill level for the perfect game, or challenge detectives around the world. 
- ADDITIONAL ORIGINAL CONTENT – What happened after the shocking events of Tudor Mansion? Find out in a series of original new crime scenes designed specifically for the digital version of Clue/Cluedo! New characters emerge, bringing with them new clues, motives and case files to consider as you travel around the world in search of the truth. 

Sharpen your mind with the iconic murder-mystery board game, now available on mobile!

pt.description:
"Cytus II" is a music rhythm game created by Rayark Games. It's our fourth rhythm game title, following the footsteps of three global successes, "Cytus", "DEEMO" and "VOEZ". This sequel to "Cytus" brings back the original staff and is a product of hardwork and devotion. 

In the future, humans have redefined internet development and connections. We can now easily sync the real world with the internet world, changing life as we have known for thousands of years. 

In the mega virtual internet space cyTus, there exists a mysterious DJ legend Æsir. His music has an irresistible charm; people fall madly in love with his music. Rumor has it that every note and beat of his music hits the audiences in 
the depths of their souls. 

One day, Æsir, who had never shown his face before, suddenly announced that he will be holding the first mega virtual concert —— Æsir-FEST and will invite a top idol singer and a popular DJ as opening performances. The instant the ticket sales began, an unprecedented rush occurred. Everyone wanted to see Æsir's real face. 

On the day of the FEST,  millions of people were connected to the event. At one hour before the event started,  the previous world record for most simultaneous connection was smashed. The whole city was on its feet, waiting for Æsir to descent from the skies...

Game Features:

- The unique "Active Judgement Line" rhythm game playstyle
Tap the notes as the judgement line hits them to achieve a high score. Through five different kinds of notes and the judgement line that actively adjusts its speed according to the beat, the gameplay experience is further combined with the music. Players can easily immerse themselves in the songs. 

- A total of 250+ high-quality songs (50+ in base game, 200+ as IAP)
The game includes songs by composers from all across the world, Japan, Korea, the US, Europe, Taiwan and more. Through the characters, players get to play songs from different genres including but not limited to: electronic, rock and classical. We are confident that this game will live up to the hype and expectations.

- Over 800 different charts
Over 800 different charts designed, from easy to hard. The rich game content can satisfy players of different levels. Experience exciting challenges and enjoyment through the sensation of your fingertips. 

- Explore the virtual internet world with the game's characters
The one-of-a-kind story system "iM" will lead the players and the in-game characters to slowly piece together the story and world behind "Cytus II". Reveal the truth of the story with a rich, cinematic visual experience. 

PAFF (CV:上坂すみれ Sumire Uesaka)

pt.releaseNotes:
The Last Warlord Official Version Patch 2.4.4 Update Notice on iOS（V1.1.9.4061）
The new updates as follow: (1/10 10:00 pm)
I. New Content:
1. Added forging function
   1. Equipment can be crafted in the workshop by consuming materials to obtain top-tier gear.
   2. Craftable equipment types include main weapons, secondary weapons, and armor, each with 10 levels.
   3. Crafting methods are divided into three types: normal crafting, enhanced crafting, and ultimate crafting. Each method has a success rate, and failures will increase the success rate.
2. Added mercenary system
   1. Mercenaries can be purchased with money at the training ground in the territory.
   2. Mercenaries are troops pre-equipped with generals and soldiers. After purchase, they do not consume resources but are one-time consumables, usable in tasks and stages.
   3. Mercenaries are refreshed quarterly. Players can purchase up to 10 mercenaries simultaneously, and unwanted mercenaries can be deleted.
3. Added all tasks for Chapter 5.
4. Added all stages for Chapter 5.
5. Added multi-unit configuration for players' private troops. Players can now configure up to 5 private troop units (dependent on rank), and the generals of these private troops can be either the player’s own generals or their subordinate generals.

II. Optimizations:
1. Comprehensively optimized the multi-unit expedition function. Multiple units can now be deployed in both stages and tasks. Deployable units can include faction troops, private troops, and mercenaries (faction troops are not usable in tasks).
2. Adjusted the difficulty of the "Battle of Guangzong." All friendly troops no longer inherit damage, and troops are reconfigured for the second battle. Additionally, the configurations for the troops of Liu Bei, Guan Yu, and Zhang Fei have been enhanced.

III. Bug Fixes:
1. Fixed an issue where equipment special effects were not working.
2. Fixed various interface issues.
pt.description:
"The End of Han Dynasty" requer que a versão do sistema seja iOS 16 e superior e use iPhone 7 ou 7Plus, iPhone 8 ou 8 Plus, iPhone X e superior, iPad Air 2, iPad mini 4, iPad 2017 ou qualquer iPad Pro para jogar.


Introdução do jogo

"Três Reinos: Hegemonia no Fim da Dinastia Han" é um jogo SLG baseado em turnos cuidadosamente produzido pelo Longyou Tianxia Studio. É baseado principalmente no novo pensamento das pessoas e na nova perspectiva do jogo Três Reinos para criar um mundo diferente dos Três Reinos. Com base no retorno à categoria de estratégia tradicional, ele retrata profundamente as diferenças regionais entre as cidades dos três países e as semelhanças e diferenças das próprias capacidades e características de cada comandante militar. Em termos de combate, destaca o encanto de combinar a hora certa, o lugar certo e a implantação de pessoas.

Funcionalidades do jogo

Um: estilo clássico de bordado com desenho de linha branca, simples e elegante

As cabeças dos personagens adotam o estilo e a cor do bordado em linha branca da clássica história em quadrinhos "Romance dos Três Reinos". A interface do jogo adota o estilo antigo e o design com charme antigo, autêntico estilo chinês.


Dois: modo de gestão governamental simples e fácil de usar:

Arranjos básicos de assuntos internos, exploração de pessoal, reconhecimento militar e desenvolvimento de tecnologia adotam um modo de gerenciamento de posicionamento para reduzir operações tediosas e repetitivas e permitir que os jogadores se concentrem em outros eventos. No modo de jogo monarca, os jogadores só precisam prestar atenção à gestão da capital e do país. Outras cidades são entregues ao prefeito. Use a política para dar diferentes instruções militares e políticas para a subcidade.


Três: configurações de conteúdo de jogo extremamente ricas:

De 184 a 280 DC, mais de 1.300 generais (incluindo generais históricos e históricos) apareceram em cena.

As capacidades básicas de 30 generais são divididas e as capacidades dos generais são diferenciadas em detalhes.

Mais de 300 configurações independentes das características dos generais, totalmente destacar as diferenças individuais dos generais.

Existem mais de 500 itens e cenários de tesouro com evidências de pesquisa. Uma variedade de classificações é dividida para atender a diferentes preferências.

Quase mais de 60 tipos diferentes de cidades, mais de 200 características urbanas bem documentadas e produtos especiais.

Ricos itens de desenvolvimento técnico e suporte em todo o sistema de jogo. Reflete a importância da força científica e tecnológica.

As seis armas básicas e mais de uma dúzia de armas especiais constituem um rico sistema de armas.

Sistema super rico de cargos oficiais e títulos nobres.

O sistema de casamento apontado pelo monarca e o sistema de treinamento e herança infantil humanizado.

Vários fenômenos naturais e desastres de eventos simulam o período conturbado dos Três Reinos.

Muitas forças estrangeiras e bandidos e bandidos precisam de você para esmagá-los e eliminá-los.

Uma riqueza de visitas, mercadores, imortais, celebridades, médicos, mestres artesãos, espadachins vagam por aí, desencadeando vários eventos funcionais.


Quatro: Retorne ao sistema clássico de combate baseado em turnos, com foco na formação estratégica de tropas

A introdução do clima, topografia e alturas dos blocos destaca com mais destaque a influência dos fatores de tempo e localização na guerra.

pt.description:
Imagine uma fábrica mágica bem na sua sala. Uma obra de arte cuidadosamente planejada, onde funcionários dedicados criam qualquer coisa que os clientes desejarem. Patos de borracha e cômodas, drones e guitarras elétricas, patinetes e outras coisas incríveis podem ser criadas a partir de diferentes materiais e vendidas em troca de dinheiro – o qual você pode reinvestir na fábrica para obter mais máquinas, mais funcionários e expandir o seu negócio. Na Little Big Workshop, você se torna um magnata da fabricação!

Fábricas de verdade - só que DIVERTIDAS
Você é o Chefe e é hora de assumir a sua própria fábrica. Organize o chão da fábrica, gerencie seus funcionários, compre maquinário e monte linhas de produção eficientes – tudo dentro do prazo e garantindo a satisfação do cliente! 

Uma experiência aberta sandbox
Vá com calma: essa é uma experiência sandbox em que você pensa, reflete e mexe nas coisas até conseguir deixar as coisas do jeito que quiser. Forneça produtos para clientes num mercado em constante mudança, produzindo mais de 50 tipos únicos de produtos feitos com inúmeras partes e peças – sendo que todos podem ser criados com diferentes materiais e métodos de produção. Não existem duas fábricas iguais.

Mãos pequenas, sonhos grandes
Comece com uma pequena oficina e a transforme numa fábrica cheia de oficinas. Desbloqueie máquinas cada vez mais sofisticadas, acrescente ainda mais métodos de produção e, o mais importante, crie mais espaço. Em breve você terá várias linhas de produção, produzindo centenas de produtos avançados todos os dias e observando com alegria os seus funcionários fofinhos realizarem o trabalho pesado.

Características:
- Indústrias variadas e uma ampla gama de produtos
- Foco em problemas práticos, não em valores, economia ou logística
- Organize todos os passos da produção no papel primeiro
- As fábricas crescem à medida que você desbloqueia mais espaço para mesas
- Ciclo diurno / noturno totalmente simulado
- Cuide dos seus funcionários! Se eles trabalharem demais, eles caem como moscas
- Linda arte em estilo de cidade modelo

pt.description:
Plan sun and moon positions before you arrive. Predict golden hour, moonrise, and light direction—plus widgets that keep key times visible at a glance.

Know where the light will be—before you go.

Solar Arc is a sun and moon planning tool built for people who care about timing, direction, and alignment. Instead of guessing or arriving too late, you can predict exactly how light will move across a location—hours or days in advance.

Whether you’re scouting, planning a shoot, or timing a sunset or moonrise, Solar Arc gives you clarity before you commit.

--

Plan with Precision

• Live Sun & Moon Arc Visualization
See real-time solar and lunar paths with compass-based direction.

• Golden Hour & Blue Hour Forecasts
Know the precise windows when light is at its best.

• Moonrise & Moonset Planning
Track lunar timing and position for night and landscape work.

• Forecasting & Location Planning
Preview sun and moon paths for any date, anywhere.

• Offline Access
All core planning tools work without a connection in the field.

pt.description:
Card.Note：小某书百万博主私藏推荐的手账类App 

这是一款以卡片为主要设计理念的极简记事 App ；
你写的每一段文字都可以生成一张张精美的卡片 。

你可以用它来写诗、短文、随想； 
也可以用它来写日记、清单、规划、要事提醒；
还可以直接用语音输入来记录每个瞬间的念头。

「Card.Note」九大特点：

1.极简设计
循着极简的设计理念，结合图标及手势操作，轻松上手。

2.文青定制
精选了 10 款记事字体及 9 种文青主题色卡、多达 100 种不同颜色的色卡，可根据喜好定制各种卡片。

3.全局卡片化
充分融入了卡片设计理念，可根据喜好随意切换横版或竖版两种卡片笔记显示样式。

4.全局手势化
下拉可新建笔记，再下拉可保存笔记，右滑可呼出作品集，长按卡片可预览卡片内容。

5.语音录入
打开便可直接语音输入，随时记录每个灵光显现的想法。你可以把它当作成iOS文艺版“闪念胶囊”。

6.要事提醒：
可设置提醒闹种，重要事情和计划不再错失。

7.快捷高效
支持Widget小组件功能，可直接在应用图标或Widget快速打开应用或直接进入创建笔记界面，让你随时高效地记录每个念头。

8.iCloud云同步
支持iCloud云同步，多台设备间数据可任意同步。

9.深色模式
全局适配深色模式，视觉舒适不刺眼。

感谢下载，生活愉快。

如有问题或建议，请联系开发者
微博：土味文艺开发者
邮箱：yande18@126.com

pt.description:
Já imaginou como é estar na linha da frente da segurança nacional?

Em Black Border 2, você assume o papel de um agente da Polícia de Fronteira, enfrentando situações desafiantes a cada turno. Com visuais detalhados e jogabilidade envolvente, este jogo oferece uma experiência realista incomparável que coloca você no centro da ação.

Assuma a responsabilidade de proteger as fronteiras do seu país contra o contrabando ilegal. Inspecione veículos, reveja documentos e enfrente contrabandistas que tentam traficar drogas, armas e outras mercadorias ilegais.

Cada dia traz novos desafios, onde pensamento rápido e visão aguçada são as suas melhores ferramentas. Você é mais do que um simples agente de fronteira — você é a última linha de defesa.

Funcionalidades de Black Border 2:

    Simulação autêntica de patrulha de fronteira: Coloque-se no papel de um verdadeiro agente, onde cada decisão conta e cada interação está carregada de tensão.

    Inspeção detalhada de documentos: Analise cuidadosamente passaportes, autorizações e outros documentos para decidir quem pode entrar e quem deve ser barrado.

    Deteção de contrabando: Realize buscas minuciosas em veículos e inspeções pessoais para capturar criminosos que tentam contrabandear mercadorias ilegais.

    Personagens dinâmicos com IA: Interaja com personagens realistas que reagem e se adaptam com base nas suas decisões e ações.

    Desafios crescentes: Desde pequenos erros em documentos até grandes redes de contrabando, enfrente missões cada vez mais intensas que vão testar os seus limites.

Explore a Tabela Periódica como nunca antes com o nosso inovador aplicativo 3D! Mergulhe no fascinante mundo dos elementos de uma forma totalmente nova e visualmente impressionante. Nosso aplicativo oferece uma experiência minimalista e envolvente que transforma a exploração da Tabela Periódica em uma jornada única e emocionante.

Com nossa interface intuitiva e design minimalista, você pode navegar facilmente pelos elementos. Cada elemento ganha vida em um envolvente ambiente 3D, permitindo que você visualize sua estrutura de uma maneira que nunca experimentou antes. Observe como os elementos interagem entre si e descubra suas propriedades de uma maneira totalmente nova.

Quer saber mais sobre um elemento específico? Nosso aplicativo fornece informações detalhadas e de fácil compreensão sobre cada elemento, desde suas propriedades físicas e químicas até sua história e usos práticos. A aprendizagem da Tabela Periódica nunca foi tão acessível e emocionante.

Além disso, nosso aplicativo é perfeito para estudantes, profissionais e entusiastas da ciência. Seja você estudando química ou apenas curioso sobre o mundo dos elementos, nosso aplicativo 3D oferece uma experiência educacional e divertida.

Baixe agora e mergulhe na beleza da Tabela Periódica de uma maneira que você nunca imaginou. Explore, aprenda e maravilhe-se com os elementos com nosso aplicativo 3D hoje!

pt.description:
Decide rápido e ataca mais depressa que todos! Como o exorcista supremo, escolhe os ataques certos, melhora o teu baralho de combate e combina traços e itens para salvares as almas amaldiçoadas — antes que a morte te alcance.

▪ Combate por Turnos em Tempo Real
Os inimigos reagem no momento em que tomas uma decisão! Ação rápida e intensa a cada jogada.

▪ 4 Personagens com Estratégias Únicas
Cada uma com 8 ataques distintos, animações exclusivas e 2 traços passivos. Adapta o teu estilo de jogo a cada partida.

▪ Limite de Tempo – Pensa rápido, ataca mais rápido!
Tens apenas 7 minutos para derrotar todos os inimigos. Foste treinado sem piedade para isto.

▪ Combinações de Itens e Traços
Sinergias estratégicas que se ativam automaticamente durante o combate. O segredo da vitória é o timing e a adaptação!

▪ Roguelite
Derrota os 7 mapas e o boss numa única sessão – ou começa de novo! Limpa o mesmo mapa 3 vezes para desbloquear o progresso. Junta moedas, reforça o teu baralho e volta à ação!

▪ Suporte total para comandos  
Compatível com Xbox, DualShock/DualSense e a maioria dos comandos xInput/Direct Input.  

▪ Suporte para 12 idiomas  
Coreano, Inglês, Japonês, Chinês (Simplificado/Tradicional), Francês, Alemão, Italiano, Espanhol, Português, Português do Brasil e Russo.

▪ Jogo offline
Todos os dados são guardados localmente. Não é necessária ligação à internet.
Atenção- Desinstalar a app irá apagar os dados guardados.

You will be able to explore your eating habits visually and improve your eating habits. No calories and no numbers are shown in the app! 

Features:
+ Beautifully minimalist food diary app
+ In-App Camera And Filter
+ No calories No Pressure
+ Visualizes all your diets and shows your diet balance clearly!
+ Crazy and Interactive Foody Face
+ Learn how to eat mindfully and correctly right now!

Don’t make Foody Face angry! Tap download right now!

----------

The inspiration behind FoodyLife is that nowadays people pay little attention to what they eat and often eat unhealthy food. Although there are many similar apps on the market (e.g. Fitness App, Calorie counter...), most of them focus mainly on “numbers”, such as how many calories the user has eaten and how long the user should exercise to get rid of those calories, or sending the user notifications when they should get up to exercise or if they have eaten too much.

FoodyLife’ is an app that helps users track their daily diet by allowing them to keep their own food diary. The app shows neither calories nor numbers; instead, users have only to take a picture, enter their diet information, then they are able their overall diet balance. It is very simple and highly effective. Users can explore their eating habits visually, improving self-consciousness about eating habits.

pt.description:
An open world adventure game filled with silly characters and terrible secrets.

Afterplace is an adventurous indie game for mobile devices. It's a huge open world, full of hidden secrets, treasures, and creatures. You'll run around the woods, fight monsters, and talk to ostensibly shady characters! All from your pocket! Be warned though - you never know what the forest might be hiding, and not all trails are paved. Labyrinths and dungeons are tucked away in the most concealed nooks. There are no waypoints in Afterplace. You'll have to forge your own path.

Afterplace has been designed from the ground up to be a fast, fluid, beautiful experience for mobile. There are no virtual buttons. You can move and attack by touching anywhere. You can tap objects directly to interact or attack, use two thumbs like a traditional controller, or control the game with a physical gamepad. The game will adapt dynamically to your play style. Pick up and set down the game at your own pace, it will always save your progress. Afterplace is made to feel like a full-fledged indie adventure game that fits in your pocket.


About the Author:
Afterplace is made by one person, Evan Kice. A former software engineer from Austin TX, Evan quit his job (to the dismay of his friends and family) and has been working full time on Afterplace since early 2019. The initial game released in December of 2022, but Evan plans on continuing to support and polish the game when he can!
